prompts: Create a majestic bird Pokemon with strong wings and a fierce gaze.
I want an elegant Pokemon that embodies the spirit of freedom and bravery.
Generate a flying-type Pokemon that has red and blue feathers, soaring through the sky.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a majestic eagle, known for its loyalty and courage.
Imagine a Pokemon with a striking appearance, combining the colors of the sky and fire.
Design a powerful bird Pokemon that commands respect and has a unique battle style.
Show me a Pokemon that symbolizes strength and determination, with vibrant plumage.
